mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_TBL VALUES(SEQ_CHAL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ chalTitle }, #{ chalContent }, #{ chalFileName }, #{ chalFileRename }, #{ chalFilePath }, #{ chalFileLength }, #{ chalStartDate }, #{ chalEndDate }, #{ chalPublic }, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{ chalUserId })
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAL_TBL SET CHAL_CONTENT = #{ chalContent }, CHAL_PUBLIC = #{ chalPublic }, CHAL_FILE_NAME = #{ chalFileName }, CHAL_FILE_RENAME = #{ chalFileRename }, CHAL_FILE_PATH = #{ chalFilePath }, CHAL_FILE_LENGTH = #{ chalFileLength }, CHAL_UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo }
UPDATE CHAL_TBL SET CHAL_FINISH = 'Y', CHAL_UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE CHAL_END_DATE < SYSDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAL_TBL WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAL_TBL WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo }
SELECT * FROM CHAL_TBL WHERE CHAL_TITLE = #{ chalTitle }
SELECT * FROM CHAL_TBL WHERE CHAL_USER_ID = #{ userId }
SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM CHAL_TBL A JOIN CHAL_BOARD_TBL B ON B.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{ userId } WHERE A.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND A.CHAL_NO = B.CHAL_NO

SELECT A.* , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_LIKE_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_NO IN (SELECT B.C_BOARD_NO FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL B WHERE B.CHAL_NO = A.CHAL_NO)) AS LIKE_CNT FROM CHAL_TBL A WHERE CHAL_USER_ID = #{ userId }

SELECT DISTINCT A.* , SUM(CASE WHEN C.C_BOARD_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER(PARTITION BY A.CHAL_NO) AS LIKE_CNT FROM CHAL_TBL A , CHAL_BOARD_TBL B , CHAL_LIKE_TBL C WHERE A.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND A.CHAL_NO = B.CHAL_NO AND B.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{ userId } AND B.C_BOARD_NO = C.C_BOARD_NO (+)
SELECT A.CHAL_NO , COUNT(DISTINCT B.C_BOARD_WRITER) AS PEOPLE_CNT FROM CHAL_TBL A , CHAL_BOARD_TBL B WHERE A.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND A.CHAL_NO = B.CHAL_NO GROUP BY A.CHAL_NO
SELECT A.CHAL_NO , COUNT(B.C_BOARD_WRITER) AS POST_CNT FROM CHAL_TBL A , CHAL_BOARD_TBL B WHERE B.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{ userId } AND A.CHAL_NO = B.CHAL_NO GROUP BY A.CHAL_NO

SELECT * FROM CHAL_TBL
WHERE CHAL_FINISH IN('Y', 'N')
WHERE CHAL_FINISH LIKE 'Y'
WHERE CHAL_FINISH LIKE 'N'
ORDER BY CHAL_CREATE_DATE DESC
